re.alwyn974.swinger

Class Swinger

  • java.lang.Object
    • re.alwyn974.swinger.Swinger

  • public final class Swinger
extends java.lang.Object

    The Swinger class

    The Swinger main class. Contains some constants, useful methods, etc...

      • setResourcePath

        public static void setResourcePath(java.lang.String resourcePath)

        Set a path for the resource to load with getResource()

        If you do setResourcePath("resources/images/"), then doing getResource("image.png") will load resources/images/image.png.

        Parameters:
        resourcePath - The new resource path

      • getResource

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getResource(java.lang.String resource)

        Loads an image (in the resource path), same as :

        ImageIO.read(Swinger.class.getResourceAsStream(Swinger.getResourcePath() + "/animage"));
        Parameters:
        resource -
        Returns:
        The load resource
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If it failed to load it

      • getResourceIgnorePath

        ImageIO.read(Swinger.class.getResourceAsStream("/animage"));
        Parameters:
        resource -
        Returns:
        The load resource
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If it failed to load it

        Color an image with the given color
        Parameters:
        image - The image to color
        red - The red of the color you wanna apply to the image
        green - The green of the color you wanna apply to the image
        blue - The blue of the color you wanna apply to the image
        Returns:
        The same given image, but colored with the given color

      • drawFullsizedImage

        public static void drawFullsizedImage(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                      javax.swing.JComponent component,
                                      java.awt.Image image)

        Draws an image on all the component, same as :

        gdrawImage(image, 0, 0, component.getWidth(), component.getHeight(), component);
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics of the component
        component - The component where to draw the image
        image - The image to draw on the component

      • fillFullsizedRect

        public static void fillFullsizedRect(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                     javax.swing.JComponent component)

        Draws a rectangle on all the component, same as :

        g.fillRect(0, 0, component.getWidth(), component.getHeight());
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics of the component
        component - The component where to draw the rectangle

      • fillFullsizedRect

        public static void fillFullsizedRect(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                     javax.swing.JComponent component,
                                     java.awt.Color color)

        Draws a rectangle on all the component, with the given color, same as :

        g.setColor(color); g.fillRect(0, 0, component.getWidth(), component.getHeight());
        Parameters:
        color - The color
        g - The graphics of the component
        component - The component where to draw the rectangle
